awardsHtml:
4 wins & 15 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2001 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Writing for a Comedy Series
Paul Feig (writer) (For episode "Discos And Dragons".)
2000 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Casting for a Comedy Series
Allison Jones (casting executive) - Coreen Mayrs (casting executive (location)) - Jill Greenberg (casting executive (location))
2000 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Writing for a Comedy Series
Paul Feig (For Pilot (1999))

Online Film & Television Association

2018 Winner OFTA TV Hall of Fame
Television Programs
2000 Nominee OFTA Television Award
Best Actress in a New Comedy Series
Linda Cardellini

Television Critics Association Awards

2011 Nominee Heritage Award
2000 Nominee TCA Award
Outstanding Achievement in Drama
2000 Nominee TCA Award
Outstanding New Program of the Year

Costume Designers Guild Awards

2001 Nominee CDG Award
Outstanding Period/Fantasy Television Series
Debra McGuire

ALMA Awards

2001 Nominee ALMA Award
Outstanding Director of a Comedy Series
Miguel Arteta

GLAAD Media Awards

2001 Nominee GLAAD Media Award
Outstanding TV Individual Episode (In a Series Without a Regular Gay Character)
(For episode "The Little Things".)

Hollywood Makeup Artist and Hair Stylist Guild Awards

2000 Nominee Hollywood Makeup Artist and Hair Stylist Guild Award
Best Period Makeup - Television (for a Single Episode of a Regular Series - Sitcom, Drama or Daytime)
Lisa Layman - David Syner - Joseph Regina (For the pilot episode.)

Motion Picture Sound Editors, USA

2000 Nominee Golden Reel Award
Best Sound Editing - Television Episodic - Music
Jonathan Karp (music editor) (For episode "Beers And Weirs".)

YoungStar Awards

Young Artist Awards
